entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 12:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain overnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
